name: Tidefi
description: Tidefi is a digital marketplace which provides real world businesses a tokenization solution to customise their rewards programs for their clients. Built on substrate with the native token $TDFY, Tidefi is a crypto agnostic marketplace that works interoperably with all protocols. This allows the business to get closer to their users by offering special access to their products via VIP offerings, events or experiences. ATH Vodka is the first real world tokenized business on the Tidechain protocol, a premium beverage brand that launch in 2022.
